abstract: Police Chief John Covington of Seneca, SC, announces removal of Lt Mark Tiller, who fatally shot Zachary Hammond during attempted drug bust in 2015, from city's police force; Covington declines to give reason for termination.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Mark Tiller had opened fire during a drug sting in Seneca, killing Zachary Hammond, an unarmed white teenager, in 2015.
snippet: Lt. Mark Tiller had opened fire during a drug sting in Seneca, killing Zachary Hammond, an unarmed white teenager, in 2015....

headline.main: Police Officer Is Fired a Year After Fatal Shooting of South Carolina Teenager
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Officer Who Killed Teenager in a 2015 Drug Sting Is Fired
